attributes.title: Never been a more terrible app

attributes.review: This app made me lose all my brain cells✨💫🧚🌸

attributes.title: this app drowned my fish
attributes.review: ok so basically i got this app thinking it would help me with walking my bird but then like this tree came and my bird started running to it, after that the tree left (with my bird😡) and i got sad so i started crying and when i was crying my dog came flying and told me to go to the basement so then i obviously went (but keep in mind the basement was 69 miles away) so because of that i got on top of my dog and told him to fly so we can get there faster... after 420 seconds of flying we got to the basement but there was a hamster in the fish bowl, like what?!??!🤔 and i stood there like 👁👅👁but then... guess what, what? you won’t believe it there was AN ALLIGATOR 🐊 and when i saw it and sang “interior crocodile alligator i drive a chevrolet movie theater” and while i was singing that the alligator gave birth to a goldfish but i thought it was like the snack that smiles back so i ate it and then my stomach started hurting and i went to the bathroom and pooped it out and it started swimming and then i grabbed it by its hair and put it in the fish bowl and he or she started swimming for like 15 minutes and that’s when the app came to my mind be cause i didn’t have the right water in the fish tank for the goldfish so i go on my phone, open the app, and look up what drink do you put a tank with a goldfish? and then it said like no results found or something like that and i didn’t know what to do because my fish was going to die because it wouldn’t have enough energy because it wasn’t breathing anything so i look over my shoulder and my fish is upside down looking like ✖️🕳✖️ so yeah 😪😔😣thought this app would help but it just ended up killing my fish, i do not recommend getting it or supporting whoever made this app or who this app is about because they are mean and took something very important in my life  r.i.p fishydicky 😣🥺😔 you will be missed 🙏🏻       heart 😪been💔 broke😡 so 🥺many 🤠times 🤪i ✨i don’t 😔know 😳what 🤔to 😣believe 😭

attributes.review: It is despicable that a political candidate has an application to feed propaganda directly into his supporters’ mouth. This will inarguably help brainwash his serfs.
